channel.title: error handling on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in error handling on Fresh Swift

item.title: Picking the right way of failing in Swift
item.description: John Sundell looks at the different ways errors can be handled in Swift. He lists the available techniques, split in to recoverable and non-recoverable techniques, and provides examples of usage. Also, remember, print(error) is not error handling ðŸ˜‰.
